(ooc: Robo, the hologram of the city ispretty much what you and yan decided 
on it :)

+++Mantle Cyndro Mist Rubble Aqua Cinder Cledar Forrior Rixer Truttle 
Blyer+++

Mantle smiled and then walked off toward the bridge after watching Prowl 
walk in with a few injured bots and then walk out. He talked to Epyon while 
he walked.

"This ship was a big experiment, but I think its very good. Hasn't failed us 
yet." With that he entered the bridge and sat down at the commander's chair. 
The bridge was a very big round room with computers all around, and the 
commander's char was on a raised platform in the center, so that the 
commander could oversee everything that was going on. There were reports of 
security cameras and stanners and everything on the computer screens, some 
even had computer games on them! Mantle tapped a few buttons and a 3d 
hologram of a battle city, at least how Cyndro had designed it from what 
Mantle and Epyon had been talking about when they entered the Element. "How 
does that look?" Mantle asked Epyon. "If its acceptable, we can begin 
construction right away."

Even though missiles and laser shots were hitting the shields, the robots 
inside probably couldn't tell that anything was different. The ship didn't 
shake, the lights didn't blink, and everything remained the same. Outside, 
however, Cyndro focused his firepower on the attackers. Three missiles 
launched out at Sixshot, and three at Ares, followed by alot of plasma shots 
at both. He also fired four missiles at Imprisoner.



Mist watched Surgital being attacked, and didn't waste time. She aimed at 
Surgital's head and fired two charges. Below her, Rubble fired two missiles 
up at Surgital's butt :), while Aqua and Cinder decided to take down the 
bots that Abominus just seperated into. They both turned around. Aqua fired 
two spears at Hunger and Cinder fired three laser shots at Rippersnapper.



Cledar looked around the battlefield and noticed that there were alot of 
injured Maximals. He made a mental note to talk to the commander of this 
faction after the battle, and then decided to fire a few more times at 
someone, and shot his fusion cannon up at Surgital. He was sure that the 
huge beam of plasma would hit.



A large burst of flame was shot out of Forrior's tank bottom and sent him 
flying up above the missile and the shots. He landed near Predator and fired 
his fusion cannon at him almost form point-blank range.



Rixer jumped forward and avoided a missile coming at him, but several shots 
still hit him in the side. He rolled under a bunch more shots and then 
jumped up and fired a missile and twenty shots at Sun Crusher.



Truttle ducked under a shot from Predator and chuckled to himself. So far 
these Predacons were very bad at fighting. He saw Reflector firing at Rixer, 
aimed both of his machine guns, and sent fifty laser bolts out toward 
Reflector.



The missiles that Blyer fired earlier barely missed the Cybertronian Fire, 
and hit the ground harmlessly. Blyer aimed again, this time with laser 
cannons, and fired twenty rapid laser shots from each of his wing cannons at 
Firestarter.
